programme.title: Friars Club Roast of Ed Sullivan
programme.sub-title: Friars Club Roast of Ed Sullivan
programme.desc: Ed Sullivan's 10th anniversary in television roast by The Friars Club; hosted by Jack Carter and featuring appearances by friends, colleagues, and notable surprise guests along the way.

programme.title: Great Moments In Opera From The Ed Sullivan Show
programme.sub-title: Great Moments In Opera From The Ed Sullivan Show
programme.desc: Many of the great names in the history of opera have performed in the arias that made them famous; features the opera legends' complete historical performances.

programme.title: The Very Best of the Ed Sullivan Show
programme.sub-title: The Very Best of the Ed Sullivan Show
programme.desc: Clips and reminiscences from the 23-year variety series include archival footage of Julie Andrews, George Carlin, Ella Fitzgerald, Judy Garland, Elvis Presley, and Flip Wilson; host Carol Burnett. At the Ed Sullivan Theatre in New York.

programme.title: The Ed Sullivan Show: Sports Heroes
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Featuring Willie Mays' batting tips, Muhammad Ali, Sonny Liston, Joe Namath; the New York Jets win in Superbowl III, and more athletes.

programme.title: The Ed Sullivan Show: Sports Heroes
programme.sub-title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Featuring some of the many athletes of color who broke barriers during a segregated time in the United States.

programme.title: All Star Comedy From the Ed Sullivan Show
programme.sub-title: All Star Comedy From the Ed Sullivan Show
programme.desc: Host Mary Tyler Moore shows clips of Sullivan's 23-year variety series. With Milton Berle; John Byner; Jack Carter; Shecky Greene; Alan King; Shari Lewis; Rich Little; Dick Martin; Joan Rivers; Flip Wilson; Victor Borge.

programme.title: Rock 'n' Roll Revolution: The British Invade America
programme.sub-title: Rock 'n' Roll Revolution: The British Invade America
programme.desc: Hosts Michelle Phillips and Graham Nash present film clips and interviews of the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, the Animals.

programme.title: A Really Big Show: Ed Sullivan's 50th Anniversary
programme.sub-title: A Really Big Show: Ed Sullivan's 50th Anniversary
programme.desc: The Smothers Brothers introduce memorable moments from the variety show of the '60s: comedy, rock, soul; celebrity interviews, impersonators, novelty acts.
